title: Dark Navy Font!
content:
Can anyone let me know what the dark font is? Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724120406/http:/typophile.com/files/image_110.jpg) | 278.94 KB |
author: Primehunter

comments.content: Modern Black -ModernBlck is a product of MicroLogic Software, Inc. Micrologic made clones of other companies fonts - so this could have another name from another company. It is listed on several free font sites.
Thank you josev it's spot on.
